short_summary: The objective of this RFP is to purchase the delivery and installation of office furniture to supplly the required needs of Transport Canada.
description: This RFP is issued pursuant to PWGSC Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-140003/C and covers a requirement from the following Product Category of the SA: \\- Product Category 6 – Support Space – Collaborative Furniture \\ The requirement is for 339 tables and is needs to be delivered and installed by 29 March 2024
full_summary:
=====================================

#### Government Tender Announcement

#### Product Category
--------------------


**Category Title**: Collaborative Furniture for Support Spaces

**Reference Number**: cb-677-69842536

**Solicitation Number**: T8080-230241

**Notice Type**: Request for Proposal against Supply Arrangement

#### Tender Details
------------------

*   **Notice Publication Date:** November 17, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date:** November 27, 2023, 2:00 PM (ET)
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** December 1, 2023
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** March 29, 2024

#### Category Description
-------------------------

This request for proposal is issued pursuant to PWGSC Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-140003/C. The requirement is for the purchase, delivery, and installation of office furniture to Ottawa, Ontario. The scope of the requirement includes 339 tables, as detailed in the solicitation documents.

#### Important Notes
-------------------

*   This requirement is subject to the following trade agreements:
    *   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
    *   Canada-Columbia Free Trade Agreement
    *   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
    *   Canada-Chili Free Trade Agreement
    *   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
    *   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
    *   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
    *   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
    *   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement
    *   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement
    *   World Trade Organization-Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP)
*   A security requirement is associated with this requirement. Refer to the bid solicitation document for additional information.

#### Selection Criteria
----------------------

The selection of the successful bidder will be based on the **Lowest Price** quotation submitted.

#### Contact Information
----------------------

To obtain further information or clarification, please contact:

*   Diana Daigle-Pietsch
*   Telephone: 416-550-7952
*   Email: [diana.daigle-pietsch@tc.gc.ca](mailto:diana.daigle-pietsch@tc.gc.ca)

Attachments
------------

*   [Tender Notice Document (English)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice
